tool_description: Get load sheding schedule for any area by simply searching  the town name. Very Easy to use.
name: Mzansi Loadshedding Api
title: Mzansi Loadshedding Api

api_list.name: suburb
api_list.description:
### Get suburb Schedule
Returns the schedule for the specified suburb as well as extra details about loadshedding the specified palce. Such as upcoming stages and breakdowns of power plants
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mzansi-loadshedding-api.p.rapidapi.com/schedule/kagiso"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mzansi-loadshedding-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mzansi-loadshedding-api.p.rapidapi.com/schedule/{suburb}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mzansi-loadshedding-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: town
api_list.description:
## town
Returns the town information such as province and block

url = "https://mzansi-loadshedding-api.p.rapidapi.com/{town}"
